channel.title: NPR Topics: News
channel.description: NPR news, audio, and podcasts. Coverage of breaking stories, national and world news, politics, business, science, technology, and extended coverage of major national and world events.
channel.copyright: Copyright 2024 NPR - For Personal Use Only

item.title: A'ja Wilson scores 31 to lead the Aces to a third WNBA championship in 4 seasons
item.description: The Las Vegas Aces — once again — were an offensive force in the WNBA Finals, finishing off a four-game sweep of the Phoenix Mercury with a 97-86 victory.
item.content:encoded:
The Las Vegas Aces — once again — were an offensive force in the WNBA Finals, finishing off a four-game sweep of the Phoenix Mercury with a 97-86 victory.

(Image credit: Rick Scuteri)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: Opinion: 'The Shipping Forecast' reminds us of the power of the human voice
item.description: For a century, the BBC has broadcast the weather report for the seas around the UK. "The Shipping Forecast" has informed and lulled generations who tune in to hear it.
item.content:encoded:
For a century, the BBC has broadcast the weather report for the seas around the UK. "The Shipping Forecast" has informed and lulled generations who tune in to hear it.

(Image credit: Lefteris Pitarakis)
item.dc:creator: Scott Simon

item.title: This Nobel Peace Prize front-runner didn't win -- but did get the 'alternative Nobel'
item.description: The Sudan Emergency Response Rooms was considered a front-runner for the Nobel Peace Prize winner this year and last. Here's their story.
item.content:encoded:
The Sudan Emergency Response Rooms was considered a front-runner for the Nobel Peace Prize winner this year and last. Here's their story.

(Image credit: Caitlin Kelly)
item.dc:creator: Ari Daniel

item.title: Trump issues a Columbus Day proclamation to 'reclaim' the explorer's legacy
item.description: President Trump said "left-wing radicals" have tried to tarnish Columbus' legacy, and the proclamation is a way to preserve it. Some experts say it's a way to erase the heritage of Native Americans.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump said "left-wing radicals" have tried to tarnish Columbus' legacy, and the proclamation is a way to preserve it. Some experts say it's a way to erase the heritage of Native Americans.

(Image credit: Anna Moneymaker)
item.dc:creator: Ayana Archie

item.title: Israel strikes south Lebanon, killing 1 and wounding 7
item.description: Israel carried out airstrikes on southern Lebanon early Saturday, killing one person, wounding seven and briefly cutting a highway that links Beirut with parts of south Lebanon, the Health Ministry said.
item.content:encoded:
Israel carried out airstrikes on southern Lebanon early Saturday, killing one person, wounding seven and briefly cutting a highway that links Beirut with parts of south Lebanon, the Health Ministry said.

(Image credit: Mohammed Zaatari)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: She posted about Charlie Kirk's death. Within eight hours, she was fired
item.description: Alexandra is one of many people who lost their jobs for posting about the conservative influencer's death. She described the online mob that got her fired as "state-sponsored censorship."
item.content:encoded: Alexandra is one of many people who lost their jobs for posting about the conservative influencer's death. She described the online mob that got her fired as "state-sponsored censorship."
item.dc:creator: Huo Jingnan

item.title: India is forcibly deporting Muslims, including its own citizens, after Kashmir violence
item.description: In the aftermath of a deadly militant attack in Kashmir in April, authorities have expelled more than 1,500 Muslims from India, often at gunpoint.
item.content:encoded:
In the aftermath of a deadly militant attack in Kashmir in April, authorities have expelled more than 1,500 Muslims from India, often at gunpoint.

(Image credit: Pradeep Gaur)
item.dc:creator: Omkar Khandekar

item.title: Trump threatens tech export limits, new 100% tariff on Chinese imports
item.description: President Trump threatened to place an additional 100% tax on Chinese imports starting on Nov. 1 or sooner, potentially escalating tariff rates close to levels that in April fanned fears of a recession.
item.content:encoded:
President Trump threatened to place an additional 100% tax on Chinese imports starting on Nov. 1 or sooner, potentially escalating tariff rates close to levels that in April fanned fears of a recession.

(Image credit: Alex Brandon)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press

item.title: AstraZeneca makes deal with White House to lower drug prices
item.description: The U.K.-based drugmaker became the second to strike a deal with the Trump administration as part of the president's push to rein in U.S. drug prices.
item.content:encoded:
The U.K.-based drugmaker became the second to strike a deal with the Trump administration as part of the president's push to rein in U.S. drug prices.

(Image credit: Andrew Harnik)
item.dc:creator: Sydney Lupkin

item.title: Macron puts Lecornu back as France's prime minister just days after he quit
item.description: French President Emmanuel Macron has reappointed Sébastien Lecornu as prime minister, just days after his resignation, asking him to try again to form a government and produce a budget.
item.content:encoded:
French President Emmanuel Macron has reappointed Sébastien Lecornu as prime minister, just days after his resignation, asking him to try again to form a government and produce a budget.

(Image credit: Michel Euler)
item.dc:creator: The Associated Press
